Package ohos.accessibility

Class AccessibilityEventInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.accessibility.AccessibilityEventInfo

  • public class AccessibilityEventInfo
extends Object
    Describes the accessibility event information and provides the information for the accessibility service.

    The information includes the accessibility event type, the operation that triggers the accessibility event, the package name of the event source, the movement step used for reading texts, and the accessibility event list.

    When any change is made on the UI, for example, when a view control gains the focus, your app can send an AccessibilityEventInfo#TYPE_VIEW_FOCUSED_EVENT accessibility event to the accessibility service to trigger the accessibility function.

    Since:
    2
    See Also:
    AccessibilitySystemAbilityClient.sendEvent(AccessibilityEventInfo)
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Accessibility#ABILITY

      A constructor used to create an AccessibilityEventInfo instance with a specified event type like TYPE_VIEW_ACCESSIBILITY_FOCUS_CLEARED_EVENT,TYPE_VIEW_CLICKED_EVENT and TYPE_VIEW_ACCESSIBILITY_FOCUSED_EVENT.

      A constructor used to create an AccessibilityEventInfo instance by copying the specified accessibility event information.
